import React from 'react'; import { Grid, Typography, Divider, Hidden } from "@material-ui/core" import { introStyles } from "../Constant" import { GET_CHANNEL_BY_SLUG } from "../../../graphql/channel/queries" import { apolloClient } from "../../../utils"; import StringProcess from "../../../modules/stringProcess"; import _ from "lodash" interface InfoProps { channelId: string slug: string } const Info: React.FunctionComponent = (props: InfoProps) => { const classes = introStyles(); const [description, setDescription] = React.useState() const getChannel = async () => { let res = await apolloClient.query({ query: GET_CHANNEL_BY_SLUG, variables: { "slug": props.slug, }}).then((response: any) => { let description =_.get(response, "data.channel.description", "") setDescription(description) }); } React.useEffect(() => { getChannel() }) const renderInfo = () => { return (
